alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 11:03AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Cluster of heavy rains will impact portions of east central Norfolk and central Plymouth Counties through NOON EDT... At 1059 AM EDT, Doppler radar and gage data showed a cluster of heavy to torrential rains from Duxbury to East Bridgewater, moving northwest at 20 mph. Reported rainfall rates have been as much as 2 inches in 90 minutes in the Plymouth area. HAZARD...Minor nuisance flooding and ponding of water on roads and highways. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding, including ponding of water on roads and highways. If driving, be aware of the dangers of hydroplaning. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Plymouth, Weymouth, Braintree, Bridgewater, Marshfield, Middleborough, Hingham, Scituate, Pembroke, Rockland, Abington, Duxbury, Whitman, Hanover, East Bridgewater, Kingston, Carver, Holbrook and Norwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
